item.title: Fear of judgement in expressing emotions
item.author: cheret.en
item.description: Fear of judgement in expressing emotions is a very common stance which holds us back from having an honest conversation with others and sometimes even ourselves.

item.title: The act of creation
item.author: cheret.en
item.description: The act of creation is the manifestation of invisible potential into actual tangible reality.
